title: Aurora Vertex
description: A private end-to-end Solana memecoin trading bot suite. Features copy trading on Jupiter, modular bot management UI, and an in-progress sentiment-based trade automation system integrated with Telegram feeds. Built to allow flexible, real-time bot configuration and execution of copy trading strategies. Infrastructure includes a robust backend for trade orchestration and message processing.

title: Arc Airdrop Tool
description: A refined NFT airdrop platform, used in conjunction with Portals to mint and deliver more than 800,000 NFT-based loot boxes to holders of top Solana collections. The tool allows bulk airdropping via JSON upload or on-chain collection data. Designed with a user-friendly UI for secure, large-scale airdrops.

title: Architects API
description: Node.js and TypeScript backend service powering the Arc Airdrop Tool, Architects DAO site, and multiple admin tools including on-chain collection management, Portals metaverse integrations, merkle tree creation, and cNFT mints. Responsible for NFT metadata aggregation, and batch airdrop orchestration for large-scale airdrops. Provides scalable endpoints for developer and admin tooling across the Architects ecosystem.

title: Arc Drive
description: A custom-built file storage platform for storing binary data on Shadow Drive with a user friendly UI, allowing users to upload, share, and manage files within the DAO's ecosystem. Features a minimalistic, user-friendly UI for secure, decentralized, (and optionally encrypted) file storage.

title: Cardinal Staking Dashboard
description: Contract frontend engineer for Cardinal’s Solana NFT staking dashboard. Built advanced staking, rewards, and analytics UI components, supporting some of the largest Solana NFT projects. Collaborated with Cardinal's core team to expand and maintain their core product.

title: SoDead Hunting
description: A gamified staking and raffle app developed for the SoDead DAO. Combines quest-style staking, trait-based missions, and highly flexible lootbox payout mechanics, all managed from an integrated admin dashboard. Focuses on community engagement and interactive, on-chain events.

title: Architects DAO Site
description: Official site for the Architects DAO, with wallet based auth, and robust admin tools including Portals metaverse integrations, merkle tree creation, and cNFT mints.

title: Architects Discord Bot
description: A custom Discord bot designed for the Architects DAO, monitoring performance, posting real-time analytics, and providing automated info updates for admin. Enables streamlined monitoring and automated status checks via Discord commands.

title: Narentines Staking
description: A custom, non-custodial staking platform built for Narentines DAO, leveraging freeze authority to satisfy DAO requirements. Features a full-featured admin panel for monitoring staking activity and user-friendly UI for participants.

title: Narentines Raffle
description: A custom-built raffle platform for Narentines DAO, allowing NFT and SPL token raffles for community members who purchase tickets using the DAO’s SPL token. Includes an admin panel for DAO operators to create, monitor, and manage raffles, and real-time analytics for event tracking.

title: SolPyre
description: A unique dApp enabling the burning of NFTs from participating collections, with SPL token payouts for users. Provided a transparent and secure way to reduce NFT supply and reward holders via token incentives. Created for experimental tokenomics and community-driven burning events.

title: Dagger Watch
description: A lightweight, headless Node.js service for monitoring Dagger node uptime and automating updates. Used to integrate live server status with Discord notifications, enabling reliable infrastructure operations for dependent dApps and services.

title: DesoMessenger
description: Senior contract frontend developer for a blockchain messaging app, building new features and optimizing user workflows. Collaborated with a small startup team to deliver a production-ready UI tailored for encrypted, decentralized communications.
